summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North 80th Street and North 81st Street, each from Woodland Park Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; North 78th Street, and North 79th Street, each from Woodland Park Avenue to Fremont Avenue; Dayton Avenue, from North 79th Street to North 81st Street; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2108 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
